heading: HB00543
0: AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF OVERSEAS WORKERS, RATIONALIZING THE ORGANIZATION AND FUNCTIONS OF GOVERNMENT AGENCIES RELATED TO OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00543
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF OVERSEAS WORKERS, RATIONALIZING THE ORGANIZATION AND FUNCTIONS OF GOVERNMENT AGENCIES RELATED TO OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Department Of Overseas Workers Act
ABSTRACT : Aims to help overseas workers by creating an agency that will rescue them in such emergencies like: the floods in Australia, the earthquake in New Zealand; the war in Egypt, Libya and Syria; the tsunami in Japan; etc.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ARENAS, ROSE MARIE "BABY" J.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Catamco (007 2016-08-08)2. Suansing (H.) (009 2016-08-10)
3. Chipeco (030 2016-09-30)4. Espino (047 2016-11-22)
5. Abu (000 2018-02-22)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION ON 2016-07-27
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS
